main event: Two children reported observing a large silver object with four lights in the middle, traveling at a high speed on October 5, 1963.
interesting points: The object was observed to approach at a high rate of speed, estimated at 2300 mph,The sighting included two glimpses of a large silver object,The object was reported to have bright white fluorescent lights,The object was traveling north at approximately 5,000 feet,Weather conditions were clear at the time of observation.
sighted object: large silver object with four lights
witness description: two children, one of whom was age 12
